Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the dedication of our skilled artisans. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business in ways we've seen it do for others. Considering its unparalleled value, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $12000. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and we're confident this product will exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
